en: can I feed peanuts to the elephants at your wedding?
no: Får jeg gi elefantene peanøtter?

en: of course there'll be elephants it's a stereotype that you feed them peanuts
no: Jo, men de får ingen peanøtter.

en: thank you Penny and Leonard I was kind of hoping I could sit next to Anu
no: Jeg vil sitte med Anu, Leonard.

en: yeah it's just we haven't done it yet and I think it's important to make sure we're compatible before we get married
no: Vi bør sjekke at vi passer sammen før vi gifter oss.

en: it doesn't have to be tonight how about this weekend? I can get us a room at my hotel
no: Det må ikke skje i kveld. Jeg kan ordne rom på hotellet i helgen.

en: okay, sounds nice
no: Ja!

en: I am not worried if anything I'm overconfident
no: Nei, heller for selvsikker.

en: hey guys before Anu gets here can I talk about the seating situation
no: Kan vi snakke om sitteplassene?

en: ah yes I wanted to get a jump on planning a day of fun for you
no: Jeg planlegger en artig dag for deg.

en: ah to be honest I'm pretty anxious I mean this is the woman I'm marrying what if it's no good?
no: Jeg er ganske nervøs. Vi skal jo gifte oss. Tenk om det ikke blir bra.

en: just don't put so much pressure on it it - it's always a little awkward in the beginning I remember the first time I slept with Penny.
no: Det er alltid litt kleint I starten. Jeg husker den første gangen vår.

en: by the way Anu is Indian she's gonna know there's no sexual move called the screeching lotus
no: Og Anu vet nok at det ikke er noe som heter skrikende lotus.

en: hey have you checked the dates on these? they're all expired
no: Disse har gått ut på dato.

en: oh father in-law-son in-law-bonding
no: Vi knytter bånd.

en: Raj it's gonna be okay look sex isn't the most important thing in a relationship
no: Det ordner seg. Sex er ikke alt.

en: stop it you're acting weird and it's freaking me out
no: Slutt! Du gjør meg ille til mote!

en: yeah don't even get me started on unsolved mysteries
no: Og ikke snakk om uløselige mysterier

en: okay you wanted the truth here it is
no: Greit, her er sannheten.

en: oh Anu for most of my life I got so nervous around women that I couldn't talk to them without alcohol
no: Størsteparten av livet har jeg ikke greid å prate med damer uten alkohol

en: so you've been drunk every time we've seen each other?
no: Har du vært full når vi har møttes?

en: no no it hasn't happened in a long time and I really thought I was over it but I guess I don't know I guess I wanted so much for tonight to go well that I stressed myself out it came back
no: Nei, det har ikke skjedd på lenge. Jeg trodde jeg hadde kommet over det. Jeg ville at dette skulle gå bra, så jeg gjorde meg selv stresset. Det kom tilbake.

en: so the doctor prescribed Nizoral and it blocked enzyme action and the fungus cleared right up
no: Legemiddelet blokkerte enzymene, og da forsvant soppen.

en: guys focus my mom thinks that Sheldon is the reason I don't spend a lot of time with her
no: Moren min tror at Sheldon er grunnen til at vi ikke sees så ofte.

en: and it's easier to say I can't spend time with her because of Sheldon then to admit that I just I don't want to
no: Det er lettere enn å erkjenne at jeg ikke vil omgås henne.

en: Amy said she couldn't come to Thanksgiving dinner because you always have to spend it with your mother
no: Dere kom ikke på thanksgiving fordi du alltid må være med moren din.

en: look at that we're both angry at Amy you know maybe that's something we can bond over. let me ask you this how do you feel about Howard?
no: Vi er sinte på Amy begge to. Kanskje det vil føre oss nærmere. Hva synes du om Howard?

en: why would Amy feel the need to lie to me?
no: Hvorfor løy Amy til meg?

en: really? Even after she threw you under the bus you're still gonna defend her
no: Forsvarer du henne selv om hun skyldte på deg?

en: am I safe to assume you talking to me now is a good sign for our marriage?
no: Er det et godt tegn for ekteskapet vårt at du prater med meg nå?

en: thank you Amy it's so nice of you to have us over for dinner
no: Så hyggelig å få komme på middag.

en: you realise we still have a lot of work to do before we can publish
no: Det er fremdeles mye som gjenstår.

en: absolutely not if the king of Sweden hands me a medal I intend to smear it with Purell and kiss it
no: Nei, får jeg en medalje, kliner jeg på antibac og kysser den.

en: yes but he's always struck me as the guy in the plane crash who doesn't wait until you're all the way dead to eat you
no: Men han er typen til å spise en opp før man er død etter en flyulykke.

en: you know we're almost finished with our paper we just need help tracking down the citations
no: Vi er neste ferdig med artikkelen, men noen må sjekke sitatene.

en: I am not gonna spend weeks in a library looking up old papers can't we hire a grad-student to do it?
no: Kan vi ikke betale en doktorand for å sjekke sitatene?

en: well what if we ask one of our friends to help us out how about Leonard?
no: Vi kan be Leonard om hjelp.

en: Fortnite a bunch of people parachute onto an island and fight it out to be the last man standing
no: Fortnite. Masse folk kjemper til bare én er igjen på en øy.

en: more like Bachelor in Paradise but not as cut throat
no: Nei, som Ungkaren, bare snillere.

en: and depending on what you wanna build you can use LB RB LT or RT
no: Og avhengig av hva man vil bygge, kan man bruke ulike taster.

en: in a minute I wanna show Howard I can play this game
no: Jeg vil vise at jeg klarer det.

en: why not? You don't think other women find him attractive?
no: Kan ikke andre kvinner like han?

en: you know what sure the three of us in the library looking up old papers that actually could be kinda fun
no: Ja vel. Det blir gøy å lete gjennom gamle artikler med dere to.

en: I don't know if you'd like it it's kinda for gamers
no: Det er mest for gamers.

en: okay this citation is correct how're you doing?
no: Dette stemmer. Hvordan går det?

en: no it actually makes it more exciting we have to go through all of this before I run out of this
no: Nei, dette gjør det mer spennende. Vi må blir ferdig før denne er tom.

en: really video games? Is this some sort of freaky Friday thing where you're actually Howard?
no: Spiller du? Er det som i Freaky Friday, og du egentlig er Howard?

en: oh gosh my Russian's a little rusty
no: Jeg er litt rusten.

en: wait so Amy and Sheldon weren't the first to think of super asymmetry?
no: Så de var ikke først ute med superasymmetri?

en: okay okay how about this we all tell him?
no: Vi sier det sammen.

en: I was hoping Stuart could show me how to play Fortnite
no: Jeg vil lære å spille Fortnite.

en: I didn't hear a podcast
no: Jeg hørte ingenting.

en: actually I need to talk to both of you about your paper
no: Jeg må faktisk prate med dere.

en: hey do you wanna play the game or do you wanna crawl back up your mommy's shirt and chow down like a baby?
no: Vil du spille eller krype tilbake til mamma og sutte på puppen?

en: I don't understand how you're not more upset by this is your paper too
no: Hvorfor er du ikke mer lei deg?

en: well I don't need you to pretend to be okay for me if anything that makes it worse
no: Ikke lat som du har det bra. Det gjør det bare verre.

en: fine. I'm not okay. We came up with this idea at our wedding we poured months of our lives into it I thought we were changing the course of science and now it's all gone I'm devastated
no: Ja vel. Jeg syns ikke at det er noe greit. Vi fant på dette i bryllupet vårt. Vi jobbet med det i flere måneder. Jeg trodde vi revolusjonerte vitenskapen. Jeg er knust.

en: would you mind if I gave it another shot?
no: Får jeg prøve igjen?

en: son of a bitch
no: Helvete!

en: no I tried callin' but no one picked up
no: Nei, og de tar ikke telefonen.

en: I also texted to see if he wanted to go to the new Fantastic Beasts movie and they did respond
no: Han svarte ikke da jeg spurte om han ville se Fabeldyr 2.

en: I appreciate what you're trying to do but please stop you can't make this better
no: Takk, men dere kan ikke trøste oss.

en: let's just try to avoid anything that makes them think about their project or science or Nobel prices or successes or failures
no: vi må unngå alt som kan minne om prosjektet deres, vitenskap, -priser eller nederlag.

en: you can't have chicken fried steak first ting in the morning
no: Du kan ikke spise det til frokost!

en: it's a pep talk he made when he when he was a kid gave it to me years ago and told me to save it for a real emergency
no: Det er en motivasjonstale han spilte inn som gutt, - i tilfelle det skulle oppstå en nødsituasjon.

en: I tought so too I also thought superasymmerty was a good idea so what else am I wrong about
no: Jeg mente også at superasymmetri var en god idé. Jeg kan ha tatt feil om så mye.

en: I am following the example of seventeenth century philosopher René Descartes. he subjected all his believes to radical doubt so he could build a bed rock belief and build his cognitive life back up on firm principles
no: Jeg følger filosof René Descartes' eksempel. Han betvilte enhver formening, for å basere seg kun på det ubestridelige.

en: oh so yucky so yucky
no: Æsj! Altfor ekkelt!

no: Gjennomførte du opptaksprøven?

en: it's fine I don't need to be a member of the most elite magical society on the face of the earth
no: Jeg har intet behov for medlemskap i slik en eksklusiv trylleforening.

no: Du bør gjennomføre opptaksprøven.

no: Jeg kan hjelpe. Missekåringene fra barndommen- -lærte meg sceneutstråling og sabotasje av konkurrenter.

no: De trenger ikke å se opptaket.

en: like they did with that movie that was not great
no: Det fungerte dårlig i filmen.

en: look this might seem strange but uh we thought it might help you get some closure if you had a chance to properly say goodbye to your paper
no: Dette kan lyde rart, men vi tenkte du kanskje burde ta farvel med teorien.

en: wait why why did you just say you're too busy but then
no: Men du sa jo…

en: I don't think so
no: Nei!

en: It's kinda beautiful isn't it?
no: Det er jo vakkert.

en: looks like we both had theories that were wrong
no: Vi fremmet visst begge feilaktige teorier.

en: look I get that you're scared but we just have to push past that
no: Du må overvinne frykten!

en: Howard and I have been working really hard on his audition so it would be helpful to get another set of eyes on it
no: Bedøm gjerne Howards opptaksopptreden.

en: I'm the great Howdini and it's an honor to be auditioning at the Magical Castle
no: Hei! Jeg er den store Howdini! Det er en ære å være her!

en: I'm not gonna audition
no: Jeg gir opp.

en: hey this isn't about me I just wanted you to have your dream and I wanted to control everything about how you looked and acted so your victory was mine
no: Jeg ville bare virkeliggjøre din drøm, - og kontrollere alt, så din seier ville bli min seier.

en: would you be amazed if your watch survived that pounding I think you would BEHOLD
no: Det ville nok forbause deg om uret ditt overlede det! Ta i øyesyn!
